name: Time To Travel
description:
A world of flowers, blocks, and cities? If that’s your type of game, then keep looking, ‘cause this isn’t it!

This is a world populated with people, all with different personalities. So much so, that gravity doesn’t work either! Let’s explore, player!

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Space Bar to jump
X key for dialogue

Created by Donna Zeng, 2021

This semester in Game Code Design students worked on portraying themes of mental wellbeing and exploration by developing a simple 2D side scroller game set in San Francisco. As their player will move through the city, they’ll stop to engage in playful dialogue with other characters.
